sentences: Ta on piisavalt eneseupitus, et oma tähtsust üle hinnata.
See kalduvus end tõstmiseks võib takistada meeskonnatööd.
context: The word 'tõsta' in Estonian can mean to lift or raise physically, but in this context it appears to refer to the egoistic behavior of elevating oneself above others. It describes someone who constantly seeks attention and exaggerates their own importance, which relates to egotistical behavior showing off and being overly self-important.
